item.title: How Android phones became an earthquake warning system
item.description: The system uses phones’ accelerometers to trigger warnings ahead of the shaking.

item.title: YouTuber faces jail time for showing off Android-based gaming handhelds
item.description: Italian law allows for up to three years in jail for “promotion of pirated copyrighted materials.”

item.title: 6 Best Android Tablets (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Forget the iPad. Catch up on your favorite shows in bed with one of these Android-powered slates.

item.title: 10 Best Android Phones of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Shopping for a phone can be an ordeal. That’s why we’ve tested almost every Android phone, from the smartest to the cheapest—even phones that fold—to find those worth your money.
